title: ANI की गलत खबर “PMO से लड़की को ₹30 लाख की मदद”, अन्य मीडिया संगठनों ने दोहराया लेख
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: CMO Agra Mukesh Kumar Vats acknowledging @timesofindia‘ s effort in bringing to fore the plight of 17-year-old girl suffering from aplastic anemia. CMO to arrange free treatment of the girl at SGPGI Lucknow. @arvindcTOIpic.twitter.com/iAGBQi8Anf
